descripcion:
• 4-Full Stack /Web Developer (1)

    Requirements:

    Advanced / Intermediate English,

    Advanced skills in PHP, JavaScript/JSON and MySQL/SQL.

    Advanced/Intermediate HTML and Visual Basic.

    Advanced skills CSS, API REST.

    Responsive design and related UI/UX concepts.

    Intermediate skills in ASP.net (Optional).

    Benefits:

    Online, paid training

    Schedule: 9am – 6pm and 11:00 am to 8:00 pm Monday to Friday, Saturdays 9 to 1pm

    Performance incentives

    Health insurance

    Law benefits

    Salary RD$29,000.00 monthly
